testcase.classname: Test paygrades functionality in user management
testcase.name: Verify adding pay grades fuctionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on homepage...............................................passed And clicks on "Admin" in sidepanel..........................................passed Then User Management section is displayed...................................passed When Admin clicks on job dropdown...........................................passed And selects "Pay Grades" in the dropdown....................................passed Then "Pay Grades" screen is displayed.......................................passed When Admin clicks on Add button.............................................passed Then "Add Pay Grade" page is displayed......................................passed And Admin enters Hey........................................................passed And Clicks on save button...................................................passed
